code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/globalState';import{numberWithCommas}from'../utils/format';var IncomeExpenses=function IncomeExpenses(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});var income=amounts.filter(function(amount){return amount>0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0);var expense=amounts.filter(function(amount){return amount<0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"inc-exp-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Income"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{id:"money-plus",className:"money plus"},"+$",numberWithCommas(income))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Expense"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{id:"money-minus",className:"money minus"},"-$",Math.abs(numberWithCommas(expense)))));};export default IncomeExpenses;
